raw_data_table_help: Table containing the raw BiolectorXT data with Well, Filterset, Time, and Cal columns
folder_metadata_help: Folder containing the BXT.json metadata file from Biolector XT
medium_table_help: Optional table with unique medium compositions (Medium, Component1, Component2, ...)
info_table_help: Optional table mapping wells to medium names (Well, Medium)
file_input_mode_help: Choose between uploading new files or selecting existing resources from the lab
missing_raw_data_table: ⚠️ Please upload or select a Raw Data Table
missing_folder_metadata: ⚠️ Please upload or select a Metadata Folder
must_select_correct_resources: Please select resources with the correct types
import_files_info: Upload the required files to start BiolectorXT microplate analysis. The plate_layout is optional for adding custom well labels.
dashboard_description: The BiolectorXT Dashboard is a Streamlit application designed for analyzing and visualizing fermentation data from BiolectorXT microplate readers.
no_biolector_recipe_found: No BiolectorXT recipe found. Click 'Create new recipe' to get started.
processing_detect: Automatic channel detection (Biomass, pH, O2, etc.)
processing_create: Creating one table per well with all channels
processing_missing: Detecting missing values from plate layout
results_cleaned: Cleaned and structured tables per well
results_metadata: Metadata table for ML feature extraction
